name: popup-tab-switcher
description: A browser extension that makes switching between tabs more convenient.

scripts.build:prod: rm -rf build-prod && webpack build --env production && cd build-prod/ && zip -r archive.zip .
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build:e2e && npx mocha --require ts-node/register --slow 6000 --extension test.ts --recursive ./e2e/
scripts.test:e2e:ci: npm run build:e2e && mocha --require ts-node/register --slow 6000 --extension test.ts --retries 3 --exclude "**/*-view/*" --exclude "**/performance/*" --recursive ./e2e/
scripts.test:e2e:visual: npm run build:e2e && mocha --require ts-node/register --slow 6000 --extension test.ts --recursive ./e2e/**/*-view/
scripts.test:e2e:performance: npm run build:e2e && mocha --require ts-node/register --slow 6000 --extension test.ts --recursive ./e2e/**/performance/
scripts.test:e2e:mac: PUPPETEER_EXEC_PATH='/Applications/Google Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google Chrome' npm run test:e2e

author: Dmitriy Davydov
